column6: Tyrannus returns! Manhattan crumbles! Moloids attack! And only Bruce Banner and the Son of Hulk can save the day! Unless, of course, Skaar decides to join the monsters...
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | colorist:Ariel Olivetti | letterer:Simon Bowland | writer:Greg Pak | writer:Fred Van Lente | penciller:Michael Ryan
